node.excerpt: This guide is going to show you a simple way to schedule your AWS EC2 instances for applications using Elastic Beanstalk. Doing this allows you to  reduce your AWS bill  by minimizing the amount of time you run your instances. This can be useful if…

frontmatter.title: Scheduling AWS EC2 instances on Elastic Beanstalk
